item.description:
@lover854 wrote:

[b]Hello moparscape members,

Video of how it looks like: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dvnBS9k9JcE&feature=channel_video_title

Like a week ago i decide to make Rune Mysteries quest like runescape because i was bored.
And now i decide to release it for other delta users you might don’t have some methods for talk,
because i use diffrent methods then regular delta users.

So first of all search for case 40:
